text: 100 Goblin Trinkets100 Goblin Trinkets BenDjinn Games INTRODUCTION hat would a goblin be without a unique item in its possession? This supplement presents 100 goblin trinkets. For a bit more goblin goodness, check out Goblins: A Tribe Called Pitshadow available on the DMSGuild.
